name: IMMZ.DT.11.JapaneseEncephalitis
description: If child or person has not been vaccinated, give Japanese Encephalitis vaccine according to the defined schedule

action.title: Immunize Patient for Japanese Encephalitis - No Doses
action.description: Provide Japanese Encephalitis immunizations – using the "Japanese Encephalitis vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (Scheme depends on antigen)

expression.description: "Japanese Encephalitis vaccine immunization history" = "No-doses" and "Patient age" >= "6 months" and "Antigen" = "Inactivated Vero cell-derived"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Japanese Encephalitis because no doses

action.title: Immunize Patient for Japanese Encephalitis - 2nd dose
action.description: Provide Japanese Encephalitis immunizations – using the "Japanese Encephalitis vaccine immunization – Inactivated Vero cell-derived" schedule (Scheme depends on antigen)

expression.description: "Japanese Encephalitis vaccine immunization history" = "1 dose" and "Previous dose" >= "4 weeks" and "Antigen" = "Inactivated Vero cell-derived"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Japanese Encephalitis because 1 dose

action.title: Immunize Patient for Japanese Encephalitis - No Doses
action.description: Provide Japanese Encephalitis immunizations – using the "Japanese Encephalitis vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (Scheme depends on antigen)

expression.description: "Japanese Encephalitis vaccine immunization history" = "No-doses" and "Patient age" >= "8 months" and "Antigen" = "Live attentuated"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Japanese Encephalitis because no doses

action.title: Immunize Patient for Japanese Encephalitis - No Doses
action.description: Provide Japanese Encephalitis immunizations – using the "Japanese Encephalitis vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (Scheme depends on antigen)

expression.description: "Japanese Encephalitis vaccine immunization history" = "No-doses" and "Patient age" >= "9 months" and "Antigen" = "Live recombinant"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Japanese Encephalitis because no doses
